text:
using the <pre> tags to contain everything in a generated index makes it impossible to generate valid html, as the image tags and <hr> tags are not allowed within the pre tag.

I suguest it's changed to <font face="monospace"> or similar for compatablity.
creator: nathan@degruchy.org

text:
In 2.x it's possible to generate valid HTML.

Thanks for using Apache!

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9307 ***
creator: nd@perlig.de
